channel.title: trolleybuses on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in trolleybuses on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 J. G. Brill Company Logo
The J.G. Brill Company manufactured streetcars, interurban coaches, motor buses, trolleybuses and railroad cars in the United States for almost ninety years, making it the longest-lasting trolley and interurban manufacturer. At its height, Brill was the largest manufacturer of streetcars and interurban cars in the US and produced more streetcars, interurbans and gas-electric cars than any other manufacturer, building more than 45,000 streetcars alone. The company was founded in 1868 in Philadelphia by John George Brill, as a horsecar manufacturing firm.
You can download theBrilllogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Brill
item.description: The J.G. Brill Company manufactured streetcars, interurban coaches, motor buses, trolleybuses and railroad cars in the United States for almost ninety years, making it the longest-lasting trolley and interurban manufacturer. At its height, Brill was the largest manufacturer of streetcars and interurban cars in the US and produced more streetcars, interurbans and gas-electric cars than any other manufacturer, building more than 45,000 streetcars alone. The company was founded in 1868 in Philadelphia by John George Brill, as a horsecar manufacturing firm.
